casebody.data:
Richard J. THOMAS v. Walter A. HUNTER, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Leavenworth, Kan. No. 3527. Circuit Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. Sept. 12, 1947. No appearance for appellant. Randolph Carpenter, U. S. Atty., and Eugene W. Davis, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of Topeka, Kan., for appellee.

Before PHILLIPS, BRATTON and MURRAH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed on authority of Thomas v. Hunter, Warden, 10 Cir., 153 F.2d 834, without written opinion.
